categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ragar was a male Human who served as a sergeant in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic, he was stationed at Frostwake Outpost on the planet Hoth, distributing armor to other Imperial forces.
Sergeant Ragar appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Heavy Armor Vendor for Imperial players on Hoth.
